I installed halo 2 on my windows XP machine, works great. Just follow instructions the uploader wrote here on this web page, rather than the read me text file included in the download. The only problem i have is with the right joystick on my ps2 controller that i use on my pc. Every time i push up and down on the joystick, the screen looks to the sides.Every time i push to the sides on the joystick, the screen looks up and down.I dont know if i'm the only one with this problem.But on the keyboard all the buttons are right.But the main thing is that it works.Just follow instructions.

And just to let you know i did not do step 4. Before mounting the halo2.iso i changed the driver letter to "Z" then mounted the ISO. I did get an error but ignored it.I opened the "install halo2 xp" folder, and double click't the "START.bat" file.Than followed the instructions the "START.bat" said, and when it was done, I restarted the machine,and started to play.I did not drop any files on the halo 2 directory, like step 4 said.
